page.title: 14Interview With Mr Cann
page.content: Mr Cann first came to Stanton St Quintin in 1939, he lived in Chippenham before he moved here in 1976. He came here because he was in the{R.A.F.}Mr Cann was an aeroplane fitter. Mr Cann told us a story. One day war was declared. Mr Cann was down in the dip, when someone shouted "FIRE!" Some soldiers were training with an old{cannon,}when they heard the shout they let go of the rope, and then the cannon went flying around every where, it was loaded as well. It fired over Mr Cann's head, and{Mr Cousins}was in his horse and cart, and it missed him, and it was a direct hit on the {church tower.}Now there is a ring of new stones on the tower where the shell hit it.
